column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////There has long been a great battle between Lou Malnati's and Giordano's for Chicago's best authentic original deep dish pizza and it seems to be a tie
column2: depending on who you ask. Whether it be food websites
column4: food articles and publications to tourists and native Chicago-ans
column5: there is no clear cut winner. But what a treat to try both and decide for yourself!
